Sentencas: The oxygen uptake and release of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-delta (x=0.2, 0.4; y=0, 0.8, 1) perovskite powders was examined with temperature-programmed techniques.
Titulo: Partial reduction and re-oxidation of iron-and cobalt-containing perovskites using catalyst characterisation measurements

Sentencas: In addition to the commonly used temperature-programmed reduction (TPR), temperature-programmed oxidation (TPO) was used to examine oxygen adsorption on the perovskites that had previously been partially reduced.
Titulo: Partial reduction and re-oxidation of iron-and cobalt-containing perovskites using catalyst characterisation measurements

Sentencas: While perovskite reduction started slowly at an offset temperature of about 300 degreesC, the re-oxidation already started below 100 degreesC resulting in a distinct re-oxidation peak.
Titulo: Partial reduction and re-oxidation of iron-and cobalt-containing perovskites using catalyst characterisation measurements

Sentencas: The measured oxygen stoichiometry changes were in the range of delta=0.03-0.19.
Titulo: Partial reduction and re-oxidation of iron-and cobalt-containing perovskites using catalyst characterisation measurements

Sentencas: For the re-oxidation process assumed, allowing the application of conventional temperature-programmed desorption (TPD) procedures to determine the activation energy of the adsorption process.
Titulo: Partial reduction and re-oxidation of iron-and cobalt-containing perovskites using catalyst characterisation measurements

Sentencas: Simulation of the peak profiles confirmed the predominant surface kinetics.

Sentencas: The determined activation energies were in the range of 0.46-0.63 eV. For the measurements presented here.
